content.full_text: Fitz Henry Warren to Abraham Lincoln, 3 May 18491 I have the honor to inform you, that thePostmaster Generalhas appointedMunson CarterPostmaster atRochesterin the State ofIllinoisin place ofD. C Eggleston– Resigned.2
paragraphs: Fitz Henry Warren to Abraham Lincoln, 3 May 18491
I have the honor to inform you, that thePostmaster Generalhas appointedMunson CarterPostmaster atRochesterin the State ofIllinoisin place ofD. C Eggleston– Resigned.2

footnotes.text: 1Fitz Henry Warren signed this form letter.

2Munson Carter remained postmaster of Rochester, Illinois,   until after the end of
